definition: so much evil that it reaches all the way to heaven (idiom)
Greed is the root of all evil.
pinyin: tan1 lan2 shi4 wan4 e4 zhi1 yuan2

definition: Money is the root of all evil.
pinyin: qian2 shi4 wan4 e4 zhi1 yuan2

sentences.english: He contended that gambling was the worst of all evils.
sentences.chinese: 他堅持認爲賭博爲萬惡之首。

sentences.english: For money is a root of allkinds of evil.
Some great man said money is the source of all money.
sentences.chinese: 某個偉人說過金錢是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Her evil, headed by a hundred good filial first.
sentences.chinese: 萬惡淫爲首，百善孝爲先。

sentences.english: Money is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 對金錢的愛是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: Whether is money the origin of good or evil has been a long-time-discussed topic.
sentences.chinese: 金錢到底是萬惡之源還是萬善之源已經被討論了很久。

sentences.english: But as for that most wicked man Nicanor, who had brought a thousand merchants to the sale of the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 那曾帶一千商人來購買猶太人的萬惡的尼加諾爾。

sentences.english: On our planet going to the hell means going to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的星球最高懲罰就是讓萬惡之徒滾去地球。

sentences.english: Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man.
sentences.chinese: 希望乃萬惡之首，因爲它持續人痛苦的折磨。

sentences.english: Diligence is the mother of success, idleness is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 勤奮是成功之母，懶惰乃萬惡之源。

sentences.english: The evil old society snuffed out the lives of her three children.
sentences.chinese: 萬惡的舊社會奪走了她三個孩子的生命。

sentences.english: The source that says contest price rank is extremely evil is not beyond the mark .
sentences.chinese: 說競價排名是萬惡之源一點都不過分。

sentences.english: So you think that money is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 既然你認爲金錢是萬惡之源。

sentences.english: It is destructive living for self.
Hope is the worst of evils, for it prolongs the torments of man.
sentences.chinese: 希望是萬惡之首，因爲它不斷延長着人們的痛苦。

sentences.english: 172】:Hope is the worst of all evils, for it prolongs the torment of man.
sentences.chinese: 希望是萬惡之首，它不斷延長着人們的痛苦。
